attributes.title: Why should we know about Third Eye?
attributes.description:
In this short video, taken from the 23 September 2016 morning discourse 'Third Eye - Naturally Super, Not Supernatural' (http://bit.ly/2d8WDFB), Paramahamsa Nithyananda explains why we should know about third eye.

He tells us that just we need to know the basics of Third Eye, for us to experience it. The thorough introduction, the users manual is necessary for us to make life really happen for us. Without it, we will only be surviving. Only when we experience third eye,  we will really be alive!

Agamas and Upanishads are the user manual for us - we need to know the science from these scriptures. Paramahamsa Nithyananda shares this science in his YouTube channel. Do not forget to subscribe!
